intro: Dendrobium sumatranum, commonly known as the Sumatran orchid, is an epiphytic orchid native to Southeast Asia. It features a sympodial growth habit with multiple stems that can grow up to several meters in length. The plant produces clusters of fragrant, yellowish-green flowers with a distinctive red or purple lip. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires good air circulation. Its leaves are usually elongated and革质, adapting to its epiphytic lifestyle.
